title: Guide: How to use stereo 360 image with Shader Graph (Out = unity_StereoEyeIndex)
description:
I lost a lot's of time trying to find a way to have stereo image in my project with the new system of Unity with the Single Pass Instanced OpenXR system.
So this video is just to help the next one to have some difficulty doing it.
Done on Unity 2022 in Nov 2023.
My search around: https://github.com/EloiStree/HelloAndroidXR/issues/45
author: Learn By Playing In XR
